content: I'm excited to try out the Smokey Mango Mule, and thanks for the tips on using citrus vinaigrettes in cocktails! Speaking of citrus, I've been experimenting with different citrus fruits in my quinoa salad, and I think the key to a good citrus vinaigrette is using a mix of citrus juices, like lemon, lime, and orange. It gives it a nice balance of sweet and tangy. Do you have any recommendations for citrus-based cocktails that incorporate multiple citrus fruits?
